statements: UPDATE microbial_strains SET species = 'Escherichia coli', origin_country = 'USA' WHERE strain_id = 1;
UPDATE microbial_strains SET isolation_source = 'Human feces', growth_conditions = '37°C, aerobic' WHERE strain_id = 2;
UPDATE microbial_strains SET species = 'Bacteria', origin_country = 'USA' WHERE strain_id = 1;
UPDATE microbial_strains SET isolation_source = 'Soil sample', growth_conditions = '37°C, aerobic conditions' WHERE strain_id = 2;
UPDATE microbial_strains SET source_country='USA', isolation_date='2022-03-15' WHERE strain_id=1;
UPDATE strain_characteristics SET growth_rate=0.25, morphology='Rod-shaped', resistance=true WHERE strain_id=1;
UPDATE microbial_strains SET characteristics = '{"color": "yellow", "size": "large"}', isolation_date = '2023-09-15' WHERE strain_name = 'Bacteria-A'
UPDATE strain_characteristics SET resistance = TRUE, morphology = 'Rod-shaped' WHERE strain_id = 101;
UPDATE microbial_strains SET strain_name='ABC', genus='Bacteria' WHERE strain_id=1;
UPDATE strain_characteristics SET characteristic_value='Positive' WHERE characteristic_id=1;
UPDATE microbial_strains SET genus='Bacillus', species='subtilis' WHERE strain_id=1;
UPDATE strain_characteristics SET characteristic_value='Gram-positive' WHERE strain_id=1 AND characteristic_name='Gram Stain';
UPDATE microbial_strains SET species='Bacteria' WHERE id=1;
UPDATE microbial_characteristics SET temperature=28 WHERE id=2;
UPDATE microbial_strains SET species='Bacteria', description='Gram-negative' WHERE id=1;
UPDATE microbial_characteristics SET humidity=0.65 WHERE strain_id=3;
UPDATE strains SET origin='USA' WHERE name='Blue Dream';
UPDATE characteristics SET growth_rate=0.8 WHERE strain_id=1;
UPDATE strains SET species='Sativa' WHERE id=5;
